name: MULTPL_SP500_DIV_YIELD_MONTH
des: S&P 500 dividend yield (12 month dividend per share)/price. Yields following March 2022 (including the current yield) are estimated based on 12 month dividends through March 2022, as reported by S&P. Sources: Standard & Poor's for current S&P 500 Dividend Yield. Robert Shiller and his book Irrational Exuberance for historic S&P 500 Dividend Yields.
